feed.title: Voyager: AI and Data Science
feed.subtitle:
Welcome to "Voyager: AI and Data Science," a dedicated sub-channel of the Voyager podcast, where we navigate the vast and dynamic realms of artificial intelligence and data science. Each episode is a journey through the most intriguing and revolutionary aspects of AI and data science, curated meticulously from the latest online trends, discussions, and breakthroughs.
Join us as we delve into the depths of machine learning, neural networks, predictive analytics, and much more. Our podcast is more than just a collection of topics; it's a synthesis of cutting-edge information and insightful discussions, designed to enlighten both enthusiasts and professionals alike.
In "Voyager: AI and Data Science," we break down complex concepts into understandable segments, analyze emerging trends, and explore the real-world applications that are reshaping industries, from healthcare to finance, and beyond. Whether you're a seasoned expert in the field or just AI-curious, our episodes promise to provide valuable insights and stimulate thought-provoking conversations.
As a sub-channel of the renowned Voyager podcast, we uphold the legacy of exploring uncharted territories, this time in the digital realm. Our mission is to not only inform but also inspire our listeners by showcasing how AI and data science continue to push the boundaries of what's possible.
Tune in to "Voyager: AI and Data Science" and be a part of this exciting journey into the future, where data meets intelligence, and where every discovery opens doors to new possibilities. Subscribe now and never miss an episode of our voyage through the ever-evolving landscape of AI and data science.

entry.title:
"The Cutting Edge of Healthcare: Unleashing the Power of Google Cloud"
"Revolutionizing Research: Qubrid GPU Cloud Platform Takes the Lead"
"Transforming Lens Data Analytics: Tempus One AI Assistant Unveiled"
"Fueling the Future: Chipotle's Innovative Benefits for Gen Z Workforce"
"Recognizing Excellence: The 40 Under 40 Data Scientists Awards 2024"
"Pioneering AI and Language Technology: The University of the Basque Country and Avature Join Forces"
"Unleashing AI on a Raspberry Pi: A Weekend Project with Speech Recognition and PTT"
entry.summary:
In the world of healthcare, Atropos Health has partnered with Google Cloud to generate actionable clinical evidence for healthcare institutions. This collaboration aims to leverage the power of Google Cloud's technology to provide valuable insights and improve patient care.

Qubrid, a GPU Cloud Platform, has announced the early access availability of its platform. This platform is designed for generative AI, LLM, and quantum computing simulations. It offers researchers and developers the tools they need to explore and advance these cutting-edge technologies.

Tempus, a leading data analytics platform, has launched an AI assistant called 'Tempus One'. This assistant is designed to enhance research in lens data analytics. By leveraging artificial intelligence, Tempus One aims to provide researchers with valuable insights and improve the efficiency of their work.

In the corporate world, Chipotle has introduced new benefits to attract and support its growing Gen Z workforce. As the company recognizes the importance of this demographic, it has implemented various initiatives to cater to their needs and create a supportive work environment.

In the field of data science, the 40 Under 40 Data Scientists Awards for 2024 have been announced. This prestigious award recognizes the achievements and contributions of young data scientists who have made significant impacts in their respective fields.

The University of the Basque Country and Avature have joined forces to launch the first Chair in AI and Language Technology. This collaboration aims to advance research and innovation in the field of artificial intelligence and language technology, fostering academic excellence and technological advancements.

On a more personal note, a weekend AI project has caught attention. This project involves using speech recognition, push-to-talk (PTT) functionality, and a large action model on a Raspberry Pi. This innovative project showcases the potential of AI and how it can be applied to everyday devices, opening up new possibilities for voice-controlled technology.

New Tools, Products, or Projects:
- Atropos Health leveraging Google Cloud for generating actionable clinical evidence
- Qubrid GPU Cloud Platform for generative AI, LLM, and quantum computing simulations
- Tempus One AI assistant for enhanced research in lens data analytics
- Chipotle's new benefits for attracting and supporting Gen Z workforce
- The 40 Under 40 Data Scientists Awards 2024 winners announced
- The University of the Basque Country and Avature launching the first Chair in AI and Language Technology
- Weekend AI project using speech recognition, PTT, and a large action model on a Raspberry Pi.
